parameters.name: rm
parameters.doc: The recipe manager to use. You can get one from a world.

doc.summary: Gets whether an <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStack</ref> is a valid input for at least one recipe of a given recipe type.
doc.text: Gets whether an <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStack</ref> is a valid input for at least one recipe of a given recipe type.

parameters.name: exactMatch
parameters.doc: When this is true this will return false if the stack list contains                    more items than the recipe requires.

doc.summary: Checks whether all the ingredients of a recipe are present in a list of <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStack</ref>s.
doc.text: Checks whether all the ingredients of a recipe are present in a list of <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStack</ref>s.  This does not check that all ingredients are on different slots.

doc.summary: Takes a list of <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStacks</ref> and stacks them up so multiple ItemStacks that can be  stacked are transformed into one.
doc.text: Takes a list of <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStacks</ref> and stacks them up so multiple ItemStacks that can be  stacked are transformed into one.

doc.summary: Serialises the given <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStack</ref> to json, so it can be read back by <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/common/crafting/CraftingHelper" method="getItemStack" type="(com.google.gson.JsonObject,boolean)net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack">CraftingHelper#getItemStack(JsonObject, boolean)</ref>.
doc.text: Serialises the given <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStack</ref> to json, so it can be read back by <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/common/crafting/CraftingHelper" method="getItemStack" type="(com.google.gson.JsonObject,boolean)net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack">CraftingHelper#getItemStack(JsonObject, boolean)</ref>.
